Tags: Big Data, Business Analytics, IE Group, Innovation, Las Vegas, NV, Summit

We're bringing together 200+ leaders from the data & analytics industry for you to network, learn and to discuss the latest trends, topics & opportunities. Use code KD300 to save.




 
Las Vegas Data Innovation Summits
JULY 17-18, 2018, LAS VEGAS

Wondering what's next for Big Data?

Big Data, AI and machine learning are revolutionizing the digital landscape and the way companies do business. Embracing change and being up-to-date with the latest innovations is not anymore a luxury but a must to stay ahead of the competition.

At the Las Vegas Big Data and Business Analytics Innovation Summits we're bringing together 200+ leaders from the data & analytics industry for you to network, learn and to discuss the latest trends, topics & opportunities. With speakers from the likes of Microsoft, Capital One, Pepsico, Twitch, Bank of America, Groupon, Viacom, NYSE, MGM Resorts at the Las Vegas Data Innovation Summits July 17 & 18 2018! You can gain all of this and more saving $300 on two-day passes with the code KD300 when registering.

Join the conversations on:

  • Embracing the next wave of tools and tech capabilities to advance your competition
  • How ethics have influenced data algorithms
  • Effectively navigating a high volume of data in a data-driven world
  • Encouraging a proactive, innovative data culture to improve key decision-making processes
  • Leveraging data insights to create a quality business product create personalized customer strategies
Register now using the code KD300 to save $300
Get Your Pass
